message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $110 for it.
Hi Bob, I understand your concerns about the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $130. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $125 for the product.

Hi Bob, I understand you're still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm now offering the product to you for $128. It's the lowest price I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great value for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $123 for the product.
